test.name: Cenário 01: Entrar na aplicação com o usuário standard

kw.name: Dado que estou na tela de login
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Quando entro o username do usuário standard
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E entro a senha do usuário standard
Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então acesso a tela principal da aplicação
Verificar se está na tela de produtos
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.name: Cenário 02: Entrar na tela de detalhes de um produto

kw.name: Dado que estou na tela principal da aplicação
Verificar se está na tela de produtos
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Quando clico sobre o nome do produto "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket"
Entrar na tela de detalhes do produto "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket"
kw.source_name: Entrar na tela de detalhes do produto "${PRODUTO}"

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então sou redirecionado para a tela de detalhes do respectivo produto
Verificar se está na tela de detalhes do produto "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket"
kw.source_name: Verificar se está na tela de detalhes do produto "${PRODUTO}"

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '(//div[contains(.,'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket')])[8]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
